duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as lead technician for live events in the absence of the Director of Event Technology.
Have expert working knowledge of all AV systems in event venues.
Collaborate with the Director of AV Engineering to discuss installed AV goals and objectives for live event support.
Independently verify final event confirmations and ensure equipment is set up as per instructions.
Identify maintenance discrepancies and/or damages within event space and/or AV inventory and report to appropriate manager.
Schedule, train, and manage student employees for event support.

education_certification.credential: High school graduate or equivalent (Preferred CTS certification)
3-5 years of experience in audiovisual tech support capacity
